overview:
## Return Value

The input volume

## Discussion

Returns the input volume between 0 and 1. 0 is the same as mute.

# inputVolume

**Instance Property**

Return the input volume

## Declaration

```swift
var inputVolume: Float { get set }
```

## Return Value

The input volume

## Discussion

Returns the input volume between 0 and 1. 0 is the same as mute.
title: inputVolume
